CustomField.description: This field populates the Sum of Closed Won Opportunity Amounts Linked to Project - If there are no Opportunities associated with a Project then it populates the Total Budget Allocated for a Project
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field populates the Sum of Closed Won Opportunity Amounts Linked to Project - If there are no Opportunities associated with a Project then it populates the Total Budget Allocated for a Project
CustomField.label: Total Project Budget
